title: Urgot Skin Idea
body:
Burgot - He is a burger with fries for legs. Thank you for your time


Good April fools idea i reckon{{champion:6}}

replies.body: I both hate and love this.
So it perfectly fits the disgusting aesthetic of some April Fools lines then lmao.

That's actually a hella cool idea.

* His Passive could fire like Ketchup at enemies.
* His Q could fire like a Hamburger Buns.
* His W could fire like continuous Mustard or something at enemies.
* His E could be just a shield with Hamburger Buns at top and bottom.
* His R could be a massive plastic Straw, with a sip sound when he pulls back enemies.
He could be the appetizer from spongebob xd
I don't want a single urgot skin until star guardian urgot comes out. Period.
Picture this... Star Guardian Urgot..... Never been done before

I can actually imagine sauce cannons with this and LETTUCE SPRAYING KNEES.

Urgot needs a non serious skin, even crabgot feels too serious for its concept.

~~so lets get star guardian burgot up in here boys~~

guys guys guys but what about....STAR GUARDIAN URGOT xDDDDDDDDDDD GET IT BECAUSE HE'S UGLY AND STAR GUARDIAN IS PRETTY AND ANIME LMFAOOOOOO XDDDDDDDDDDDDDD AHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAH LOL!

God that meme pisses me off so much just because of how overused it is
I'd say  Hamburgot would be a better name

Dont forget this little old gem of a skin concept!

https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/252/850/62c.jpg
Naw man. The best April fools skin would be a Heartseeker Urgot Skin.
Urgod. Think God Fist Lee Sin but Urgot
